entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Dundalk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:14 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.3°C

entry.title: Thursday: Showers or drizzle. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Rain showers or drizzle changing to periods of snow this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
